snippet: CBS, which is reviving the Edward R. Murrow show with hosts Charlie Rose and Lara Logan, has posted vintage clips of the show online.
abstract: CBS, which is reviving the Edward R. Murrow show with hosts Charlie Rose and Lara Logan, has posted vintage clips of the show online.

headline.main: Clooney, Buffett and Bon Jovi Featured on First 'Person to Person'
headline.print_headline: Revival of Murrow Show Sets Opening Lineup
